/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of the city's towering buildings and busy traffic. The sky above is a clear blue, with wispy clouds adding a touch of whimsy to the otherwise urban landscape. The street itself is lined with a variety of vehicles, including cars and buses, hinting at the city's vibrant life. Buildings of different sizes and designs flank the street, showcasing the architectural diversity of the city. In the distance, construction cranes can be seen, suggesting ongoing development and growth. The image is rendered in a 360-degree panoramic view, providing a comprehensive look at the cityscape.
